page.title: 06Home Life in Four Lanes.
page.content: A survey was out carried in the Four Lanes district to try to get some idea of the quality of life with unemployment at about 20-25%.In our survey we took results from 241 separate houses.The results were; No. of people resident, 738 No. of cars/vans, 321 No. of television sets, 414 No. of dogs, 128 No. of cats, 160 No. of freezers, 177 In addition we asked each householder where they did the main part of their weekly shopping; Camborne-73 Redruth-76 Pool-52 Four Lanes-16 Troon-3 Carmenellis-1 Truro-1, the remainder said they used more than one place to shop in.
